attributes.action: Stop the proposed march by ISLAM4UK through Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just the suggestion of this march has caused upset and disgust. 

Allowing the proposed march would, as describe by the Prime Minister, be obscene and would show no repect for members of our armed forces who have been killed, maimed, or badly injured. 

The upset caused to the families and friends of our armed forces must also not be forgotten.

I ask that the proposed march be banned.

Robert Murphy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
